person.note: Sun(1) Yingshi [16663] His wife, born Zhang(1), was probably the daughter of one of his mother's brothers, thereby representing another example of matrilateral cross-cousin marriage. According to Yang(2) Jian(2) [15072] (Sun Yingshi, WJ, 'fu,' xia, 11b), Yingshi and Jian were both tongxue and students of Lu(5) Jiuyuan [3632]. Sun Yingshi, WJ, 'fu,' xia, 11b-12a. CBD, 3, 1934-5.
